room_title: Escape room "Titanic" by Time Escape Loveland in Fort Collins
room_description:
The year is 1912 and you have booked passage on the Titanic. You've been accused of stealing a priceless necklace from one of the wealthy passengers. To prove your innocence, you've snuck into the stateroom to search for the necklace and clear your name. Captured by the ship's security crew, you are detained in a holding cell.
Then the Titanic hits an iceberg and starts sinking! You find yourself locked in this predicament with no one but your friends to help. Your challenge is to escape captivity, find the necklace, and escape the cabin to clear your good name before both you and the Titanic meet an untimely doom.
One volunteer player is (safely) detained at the beginning of the game with handcuffs.
